metadata.description: Prospectus for "Souvenirs bibliographiques de quinzaine" and "Magasin du bibliophile," both edited edited by Charles-Louis Aubry and first published in 1797, and "Souvenir ge패ne패ral, which was never published
"Ainsi donc cette entreprise ... n'occasionnera aux souscripteurs de l'an 5 ..."--P. 8
Laid in: Paper band to wrap around delivered issues of "Souvenirs bibliographiques de quinzaine" and "Magasin du bibliophile" addressed in ms. to: Adanson, de l'Institut national, rue Chantereine
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Irregular pagination. Insert included. Text lost in binding.
